sentences.en: Apple is reportedly about to introduce a new digital taplaptablet.
sentences.cn: 据报告,苹果将要推出一款新的数字平板.

sentences.en: He was an early Christian Churchman who reportedly helped young lovers.
sentences.cn: 他是早期的一位基督教教士,传说曾帮助过年轻的情侣们.

sentences.en: Her fund strategy is reportedly based on computer trading models.
sentences.cn: 据报道,她的交易策略是以电脑交易模型为基础的.

sentences.en: Her husband’s assets are reportedly worth over $15 million.
sentences.cn: 她丈夫的资产据传超过1,500万美元。

sentences.en: More than two hundred people have reportedly been killed in the past week's fighting.
sentences.cn: 据说在上一周的战斗中有200多人丧生。

sentences.en: Owen's weekly wage is reportedly in the region of & pound ; 115 , 000.
sentences.cn: 据报道,Owen的周薪为 11.5 万 英镑.

sentences.en: People in some vehicles close to the bus were also reportedly shot.
sentences.cn: 巴士左近的一些汽车也据报有人中弹.

sentences.en: Reportedly, only two acres of land whom are goods produced.
sentences.cn: 据传, 仅二亩地所产为之皆品.

sentences.en: Roma are reportedly mulling a move for Chelsea striker Hernan Crespo.
sentences.cn: 根据,意大利罗马队正在酝酿针对切尔西前锋埃尔南·克雷斯波的转会.

sentences.en: The band have reportedly decided to split up.
sentences.cn: 据说这个乐队已经决定解散。

sentences.en: The deal will reportedly make Terry the highest paid player in England.
sentences.cn: 这份合同将会使特里成为英国薪水最高的球员.

sentences.en: The mine reportedly had an accident rate triple the national average.
sentences.cn: 据报道，该矿事故发生率是全国平均水平的3倍。

sentences.en: The publishing house reportedly retorted that geographically speaking, north China is correct.
sentences.cn: 有报道称,出版社强调从地理方面将这两个省划分在中国北方之列是正确的.

sentences.en: There was, reportedly, hand-to-hand combat in the streets.
sentences.cn: 据说街上发生了肉搏战。

sentences.en: They have reportedly offered to swap them for Mr Dadullah.
sentences.cn: 据报道,绑匪已经提出用这些人质交换达杜拉先生.

sentences.en: Thousands of people battled with police and several were reportedly wounded.
sentences.cn: 数千人与警方发生冲突，据报道有数人在冲突中受伤。

words.tran_cn: 报告文学，报道文学；报道，新闻报道

trans.tran_en: according to what some people say
